about_the_game:
As a child, now living in their creepy grandma's house, everything seems creepy. However you're not alone. Something is out to get you. Find the anomalies and fix them before it's too late.

Gameplay

Each night in this short horror experience you must venture through the house and memorize the locations and states of various objects, the return to your bed to sleep. You will be abruptly woken up periodically, where you must look all throughout the house and correct any objects that have changed. on later nights a shadowy figure will start to stalk you, you must try to avoid looking at him. In addition you must also keep the fireplace lit by adding logs every now and again, the entity likes the cold and becomes more active in it.

Additional features

The game is endless, with the main challenge being to see how far you can make it. Dying resets you to night 1. The game also features two difficulties, a more casual normal mode where the difficulty scales as you progress, and a challenge oriented hard mode where the game starts out at a much higher difficulty and stays that way throughout the nights.

This game also features a story that can be uncovered as you progress through the nights and find more secrets.

How long can you survive?

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game, it includes several references to death and contains dark and disturbing imagery.

short_description: The Shadow Stalker is out to get you, but why? Try to fall asleep while fixing anomalies around the house and keeping the fireplace lit in this horror experience as you uncover the truth of why your being haunted. How long can you survive?
